alert.note: Alert for Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:24PM CDT until June 10 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Central Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ore City, or 19 miles east of Gilmer, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Jefferson, Ore City, Diana, Karnack, Woodlawn, Smithland, Berea, Harleton, Cedar Springs, Gray, Avinger, Scottsville, Uncertain, Lassater and Nesbitt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
